content: pattern notes this blanket is worked flat from end to end when changing colors work up to the last stitch with the old color work the final pull through of the last stitch and complete with the new color cut yarn and weave in ends at every color change skills/techniques used in this pattern chain double and double_crochet decreases changing colors working with textured yarns finished measurements width 40¾ length 47¼ hooks & notions us size j-10 6 mm hook or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle materials premier® yarns elle by me charlotte c1 el7002-21 persimmon 2 balls c2 el7002-04 vanilla 2 balls c3 el7002-05 muslin 2 balls premier® yarns elle by me charlotte c4 el7003-01 persimmon multi 2 balls premier® yarns elle by me odette c5 el7005-03 blush 1 ball premier® yarns elle by me aurelie c6 el7001-01 stardust 2 balls elle by me is a contemporary line of yarns designed to empower creative expression and celebrate individuality we believe that luxury is a matter of style rather than money elevate your projects using elle by me s exquisite textures runway-inspired color palettes and unrivaled quality - all available at inclusive price points unleash your inner designer and craft elle-worthy masterpieces that seamlessly blend haute couture with handmade charm with elle by me
